entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near the Cariboo mountains near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 01 January 2023
